back_text: [skull]: -2 (-5 instead if you are at an Altered location). [cultist]: Reveal another token. Cancel the effects and icons of each skill card committed to this test. [tablet]: -3. If it is Agenda 2, you automatically fail instead. [elder_thing]: -X. Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. X is the total printed cost of those discarded cards.
name: Where Doom Awaits
text: [skull]: -1 (-3 instead if you are at an Altered location). [cultist]: Reveal another token. Cancel the effects and icons of each skill card committed to this test. [tablet]: -2 (-4 instead if it is Agenda 2). [elder_thing]: -X. Discard the top 2 cards of your deck. X is the total printed cost of those discarded cards.

back_text: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.
flavor: As you approach Sentinel Hill, you hear ancient Latin rites bellowed across the night. The time for action has come. If you cannot stop the sorcerers in Dunwich, who knows what terrors they might unleash upon the world?
name: Agenda 1 – Calling Forth the Old Ones

flavor: The Old Ones were, the Old Ones are, and the Old Ones shall be. Not in the spaces we know, but between them, They walk serene and primal, undimensioned and to us unseen. Yog-Sothoth knows the gate. Yog-Sothoth is the gate. Yog-Sothoth is the key and guardian of the gate. Past, present, future, all are one in Yog-Sothoth. He knows where the Old Ones broke through of old, and where They shall break through again. He knows where They have trod earth’s fields, and where They still tread them, and why no one can behold Them
name: Agenda 2 – Beckoning for Power

back_text:
The arcane presence masking the path further up the hill has faded. Reveal Ascending Path.
Remove all clues from each location in play.
flavor: A vibrant arcane energy fills the air with a bone-rattling chill. The energy swirls along the crushed trail before you, and seeps down several other paths before disappearing.
name: Act 1 – The Path to the Hill
text: Objective - When the investigators have collected the requisite number of clues, they must immediately spend them and advance.

back_text: Remove the set-aside Seth Bishop enemy from the game.
flavor: As you ascend the hill, the environment around you grows increasingly strange and otherworldly. The arcane energy feels even stronger here, crackling in the air and crawling on your skin.
name: Act 2 – Ascending the Hill (v. I)
text: Clues cannot be placed on non-Altered locations. Objective - When an investigator enters Sentinel Peak, advance.

back_text: Put the set-aside Seth Bishop enemy into play at Sentinel Peak.
flavor: As you ascend the hill, the environment around you grows increasingly strange and otherworldly. The arcane energy feels even stronger here, crackling in the air and crawling on your skin.
name: Act 2 – Ascending the Hill (v. II)
text: Clues cannot be placed on non-Altered locations. Objective - When an investigator enters Sentinel Peak, advance.

back_text: Put the set-aside Seth Bishop enemy into play at Sentinel Peak, with 1[per investigator] damage on him.
flavor: As you ascend the hill, the environment around you grows increasingly strange and otherworldly. The arcane energy feels even stronger here, crackling in the air and crawling on your skin.
name: Act 2 – Ascending the Hill (v. III)
text: Clues cannot be placed on non-Altered locations. Objective - When an investigator enters Sentinel Peak, advance.

back_text: You don't know how to close the swirling gate before you, and with each passing moment, the force from within it grows in strength. You fear that whatever entity the sorcerers have summoned from beyond approaches. With no time to spare, you turn to the open tome on the stone altar, desperate for answers. (→R1)
flavor: From the ruins of the headstone on the altar at the hill’s peak, a gateway of churning vibrant energy has appeared. A force like a hurricane erupts from the gate, bending trees and pulling debris into it. The howling of the gale drowns out all other sound. Somehow, you must find a way to close the gate.
name: Act 3 – The Gate Opens
text: Objective - Only investigators at Sentinel Peak may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance.

flavor: The long slope of Sentinel Hill rises before you, cresting in the jagged edges of Sentinel Peak.
name: Base of the Hill
text: Base of the Hill is connected to each copy of Diverging Path. [action]: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, put a random set-aside Diverging Path into play. (Limit once per round.) [action]: Resign. "This is more than I signed up for!"

back_text: The path leading further up the hill is masked. You cannot move into Ascending Path.
flavor: When you try to follow the path leading further up Sentinel Hill, you somehow end up walking in a perpetual loop. Each time you stop to find your bearings, you find yourself back at the base of the hill again.
name: Ascending Path
text:
Ascending Path is connected to each copy of Altered Path.
[action]: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, put a random set-aside Altered Path into play. (Limit once per round.)

back_text: As an additional cost to move to Sentinel Peak, the investigators must spend 2[per investigator] clues, as a group
flavor: An arcane wall blocks the path further up the hill, leading towards the peak.
name: Sentinel Peak
text: Forced - When an investigator at this location draws a Hex card: That investigator takes 1 damage.

name: Diverging Path
text: Forced - After you reveal Slaughtered Woods: Take 2 horror if you have no actions remaining.

name: Diverging Path
text: Forced - After you reveal Eerie Glade: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck for each action you have remaining.

name: Diverging Path
text: Forced - After you reveal Destroyed Path: Place 1[per investigator] doom on it. [action]: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, remove 1 doom from Destroyed Path.

name: Diverging Path
text: Forced - After you reveal Frozen Spring: Lose the remainder of your actions and immediately end your turn.

flavor: A shiver courses up your spine as you step forth onto the path, its route touched by a bizarre arcane power.
name: Altered Path
text: Forced - After you reveal Dimensional Gap: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an enemy is discarded. Spawn that enemy here (instead of its normal spawn location).

flavor: A shiver courses up your spine as you step forth onto the path, its route touched by a bizarre arcane power.
name: Altered Path
text: Forced - After you reveal A Tear in the Path: Take 2 damage if you have no actions remaining.

flavor: A shiver courses up your spine as you step forth onto the path, its route touched by a bizarre arcane power.
name: Altered Path
text: Forced - After you reveal Uprooted Woods: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck if you have no actions remaining.

flavor: A shiver courses up your spine as you step forth onto the path, its route touched by a bizarre arcane power.
name: Altered Path
text: Forced - After you reveal Lost Memories: Take 1 horror for each action you have remaining.

name: Seth Bishop
text: Retaliate.

name: Devotee of the Key
text: Spawn - Base of the Hill. Forced - At the end of the enemy phase, Devotee of the Key moves once toward Sentinel Peak. If Devotee of the Key is already at Sentinel Peak, discard it and add 2 doom to the current agenda, instead.

name: Crazed Shoggoth
text: Spawn - Nearest Altered location. Forced - When Crazed Shoggoth attacks: If this attack would defeat an investigator, that investigator is instead killed.

name: Rites Howled
text: Revelation - Discard the top 3 cards of each investigator's deck. Each investigator at an Altered location shuffles each weakness in his or her discard pile into his or her deck.

name: Spaces Between
text: Revelation - Flip each non-Sentinel Hill location in play to its unrevealed side, removing all clues from it. Each investigator and enemy at a location flipped in this way immediately moves to the nearest Sentinel Hill location. Shuffle each non-Sentinel Hill location, so the players do not know which is which.

name: Vortex of Time
text: Revelation - Each investigator at a Sentinel Hill location tests [willpower] (4). Each investigator who fails takes 2 damage.
